info.name: Property Listing API
info.description: Complete API collection for Property Listing Application

exec: // Prefer token from JSON body (custom SessionsController)
// Store in both environment and collection variables
// Fallback: extract token from Authorization header if present

request.description:
Admin login endpoint. Returns JWT token in Authorization header.

**Default Credentials:**
- Email: admin@propertylistings.com
- Password: admin123
Logout endpoint. Revokes the JWT token.

query.description: Filter by type: house, apartment, condo, townhouse, land, commercial

request.description:
Get all properties with optional filters and pagination.

**Pagination Parameters:**
- `page` (number): Page number (default: 1)
- `per_page` (number): Items per page (default: 25)

**Filter Parameters:**
- `available` (boolean): Filter available properties
- `featured` (boolean): Filter featured properties
- `property_type` (string): house, apartment, condo, townhouse, land, commercial
- `location` (string): Search by address
- `min_price` (number): Minimum price
- `max_price` (number): Maximum price

**Response Format:**
Returns paginated response with `data` array and `meta` object containing pagination information.

response.name: List All Properties

query.description: Filter by type: house, apartment, condo, townhouse, land, commercial

request.description:
Create a new property. Requires authentication.

**Property Types:** house, apartment, condo, townhouse, land, commercial  
**Statuses:** available, pending, sold, rented

request.description:
Upload an image for a property. Requires authentication.

**Form Data:**
- `image` (file): Image file to upload
- `is_primary` (boolean): Set as primary image

request.description:
Get all categories with pagination.

**Pagination Parameters:**
- `page` (number): Page number (default: 1)
- `per_page` (number): Items per page (default: 25)

**Response Format:**
Returns paginated response with `data` array and `meta` object containing pagination information.
Get a single category by ID.
Create a new category. Requires authentication.
Update an existing category. Requires authentication.

Get all inquiries with pagination. Requires authentication.

**Pagination Parameters:**
- `page` (number): Page number (default: 1)
- `per_page` (number): Items per page (default: 25)

**Response Format:**
Returns paginated response with `data` array and `meta` object containing pagination information.
Get a single inquiry by ID with property details. Requires authentication.
Create a new inquiry for a property. No authentication required.
